EmailTemplate.name: RE: Follow-up (1338321827.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Follow-up (1338321827.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tom, Thank you for your follow up, I hope you had a nice holiday weekend! I would be happy to speak with you though I unfortunately am not available today. I can call you at 9:30 tomorrow if that would still work for you, otherwise we will have to push it back to Thursday because my calendar is full the rest of tomorrow. If 9:30 still works for you let me know, if not, please follow my calendar link below and schedule another time that is convenient for you starting Thursday. https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> Thanks and I look forward to speaking with you! Nicolette From: tom gentile [mailto:tomgentile2000@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 10:22 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Follow-up Nicolette -- I believe we spoke a few months back. I would like to get information on your service, in particular, as a freelance marketing communications consultant, I'm interested in both your process and associated fees as a MBO consultant and the related opportunity to secure health benefits through this association. I can be reached later today or early tomorrow morning (between 9 and 10) or early afternoon (between 1 and 3). My phone number is 202-744-0331. Thank you. --
Tom Gentile 202.744.0331
